question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Recursive Call Risk] Does calculate_user_reward call any functions that could recursively call it back, creating infinite loop? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Asset Type String] Asset types are returned as String (line 49) - can these strings be manipulated or contain special characters that break claim logic? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Reward Type String] Reward types are String from line 50 - can different coin types have identical string representations causing confusion? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: verify_rule_id_config()] [Generic Type Parameter] The function uses RewardCoinType generic - can this be instantiated with non-coin types to bypass checks? (High)

(High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Rule State Snapshot] Rule state is read at line 74 - can rule be modified after this point but before calculation completes? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Multi-Read Consistency] The function reads from rule multiple times (lines 94, 102, 103) - are these reads guaranteed to be consistent? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Nested Loop Complexity] The nested while loops (lines 23-56, 32-55) have O(n*m) complexity - can this cause gas exhaustion for users with many pool/rule combinations? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Loop Variable Mutation] pool_keys and rules_keys are mutated during iteration - can this cause elements to be skipped or processed twice? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Break Condition] The while loops check vector length each iteration - can vector length change during iteration causing early exit? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Supply/Borrow Switch] The function switches between total_supply and total_borrow based on option - can option be manipulated to use wrong total? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [User Balance Type] The function switches between user_effective_supply and user_effective_borrow - can these be mixed up causing incorrect rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_atomic_claimable_rewards()] [Effective Balance Source] The function uses get_effective_balance from incentive_v3 module - can effective balance differ from actual balance in exploitable ways? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Total Balance Accuracy] Total_supply and total_borrow are used for global calculations - are these guaranteed to be sum of all user effective balances? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_user_reward()] [Balance Consistency] User effective balance is calculated outside this function - can there be mismatch between when balance is read vs when rewards are calculated? (Medium)
